title: Land for Sale in Colombo 04
details:
Highlights
- Land extent: 9.2 Perches
- Property is located on a Fareed Place, Galle Road, Colombo 04.
- The property is c. 75 meters from Galle Road.
- 50+ year old house resides on the property. Selling for land value.

Details
- 2 Story House, 4 Bed + 1 Bed Anex, c. 3000 Square Feet.
- The property is accessible via c. 20 foot wide access road [Fareed Place].
- Water & electricity accessible.
- Property is secured and enclosed by walls and a gate.
- Clear title.
